name: Poltergourmet
description:
A game made in a week as a submission for the inaugural Technically a Game Jam 2022! A game jam for the Technically Art Discord Community hosted by Harry Alisavakis.

Theme: Like X but Y

Our Take: "Like Cooking Mama but The Exorcist!"

You are the Cook-xorcist, a member of a long forgotten order of exorcists dedicated to the eradication of demons through the use of soulful cooking. 

Having received a desperate plea from a concerned neighbour, you have journeyed to Apartment 669 of the Seven Circles residential housing block, and upon arrival have found it lousy with demons. 

Grab your cauldron, prepare your ingredients, and get ready for a fight, because these demons don't want to leave, and they'll do everything in their power to keep a hold of their victim.

CONTROLS/INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Chop/Season/Tenderise/Stir/Select
  • Right Click - Close Instructional Text
  • W - Look Up
  • S - Look Down
  • Q/E - Dodge Left/Dodge Right
  • F - Interact/Back Out of View
  • R - Load Recipe /Raise Umbrella
  • Esc - Pause

Design, Code, Art, VFX, UI, Audio by Dominic Feargrieve & Nick Pritchard
